description:
Since the day our doors first opened in Phillipsburg in 1995, the attorneys at the Lehigh Valley law firm of Winegar, Wilhelm, Glynn & Roemersma have dedicated their efforts to representing the interests of clients from northern New Jersey in a wide variety of legal matters. Currently, our law firm is home to seven experienced attorneys whose more than 75 years of combined experience lead clients from both states to our office for assistance with needs in the following areas:
  • Workers' compensation
  • Family law and divorce
  • Criminal defense
  • Bankruptcy law
  • Construction Accidents
  • Social Security Disability
  • Employment law
  • Personal injuries including medical malpractice and auto accidents

From helping clients overcome financial struggles whether due to overextended credit, accidents or injuries to divorce and criminal law, the attorneys at the law firm of Winegar, Wilhelm, Glynn & Roemersma have the experience to take on even the most complex legal challenge. If you would like to learn why we have become one of northern New Jersey's most trusted law firms over the past 20-plus years, you can do so by scheduling an initial consultation with one of our lawyers at our law office in Phillipsburg.

We are a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the U.S. Bankruptcy Code.
